description: Trait that applies planning information to a document or resource. In the Arc ecosystem, this data is generated by WebSked. Newsroom use only. All these fields should be available and editable in WebSked.
title: Scheduling information

$eref.description: A grab-bag object for non-validatable data.
$eref.title: Has additional properties

___deadline_miss.description: The delta between the story's planned publish date and actual first publish time, in minutes.

___scheduled_publish_date.description: When the content was first published.

___planned_publish_date.description: When the content is planned to be published.

___inch_count_actual.description: The current length of the story in inches.

___line_count_actual.description: The current length of the story in lines.

___word_count_planned.description: The anticipated number of words in the story.

___line_count_planned.description: The anticipated length of the story in lines.

___inch_count_planned.description: The anticipated length of the story in inches.

___internal_note.description: This note is used for shared communication inside the newsroom.
___internal_note.title: Internal Note

___websked_sort_date.description: Date to be used for chronological sorting in WebSked.

___budget_line.description: Used for the newsroom to identify what the story is about, especially if a user is unfamiliar with the slug of a story and the headline or they do not yet exist. Newsroom use only.
___budget_line.title: Budget Line
